H0.text: Which English chemist discovered the most elements. Robert Boyle

H1.text: Which English chemist discovered the most elements. Joseph Priestley

H2.text: Which English chemist discovered the most elements. William Ramsay

H3.text: Which English chemist discovered the most elements. DAVY

A4.text: Sir Humphry Davy discovered potassium, sodium, calcium, strontium, barium, magnesium, boron, chlorine, and iodine.

A5.text: Davy isolated boron in 1809 through experiments on alkaline earths.
